name: Shivering Sky
description: Play as a gunner in B-25 bomber. Shoot enemy interceptors and support friendly air forces to finish the bombing mission. Chose between side, tail, top or nose gunner positions to resist enemy attacks.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 x64 Processor: Single-Core 3.5 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB VRAM, from 2013 or newer (GeForce 700, Radeon R7) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
